descript.abstract: This GIS data set was derived from a variety of source documents, including plats of survey, subdivision plats, certified survey maps, records of deed and row plats. These documents were of varying scales and from dates ranging from the late 1940's to present. These maps provide a useful representation of the geometry of the tax parcels and is suitable for its intended purpose.
descript.purpose: This data was created to serve as an inventory of property owners for use by various county departments to determine septic and building permitting, voter and tax information, planning, social services, and use for the general public.

idinfo.accconst: This data has been develped using public funds. The data is therefore in the public domain. Requestors agree that they will not sell this data, will not sell access to the data, nor will they provide for such to be sold except as allowed in NC General Statues Chapter 132. As a condition of providing electronic GIS data, Buncombe County reserves the right to require that the data requestor agree in writing that the data will not be resold or otherwise used for trade or commercial purposes. Buncombe County reserves the right ot license clients to reproduce GIS data for royalty fees based on the resale of the data and or based on a reciprocal agreement of products, services, or data.
idinfo.useconst:
The County of Buncombe acquires, develops, maintains and uses GIS data in support of its internal business functions and the public services it provides. The GIS data which Buncombe County distributes and to which it provides access may not be suitable for other purposes or uses. It is the requestor's responsibility to verify any information derived from the GIS data before making any decisions or taking any actions based on the information.
Source information used for these data may have been collected at different scales, times or definitions, resulting in inconsistencies among features represented together on this map. Primary sources from which these data were compiled must be consulted for verification of information contained in the data. Buncombe County will not re-distribute data developed from other organizations. Parcel data was prepared for the inventory of real property found within this jurisdiction, and is compiled from recorded deeds, plats, and other public records and data. Users of the data are hereby notified that the aforementioned public primary information sources should be consulted for verification of the information. Buncombe County assumes no legal responsibility for this information. Data are presented using the North Carolina State Coordinate System 1927 North American Datum. Horizontal measurement units are in feet.
Buncombe County does not guarantee that the data and map serices will be available to users without interruption or error. Furthermore, the County of Buncombe may modify or remove map servies and access methods at will.
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.1.0.722

dataqual.logic: No dangles or undershoots allowed. No minimum polygon size. Duplicate lines not allowed. Intersect only where intended. Pin number calculated based on the location of the x and y coordinates. The property layer is maintained from deeds, private surveys, and recorded plats. Data integrity verified by ESRI ArcGIS ArcInfo software version 8.3.
dataqual.complete: Land Records receives a recorded document (deed or plat) from the Register of Deeds office, then updates to the property layer are done to reflect the changes needed per the documents.

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

distinfo.distliab:
Buncombe County makes no warranties, guarantees or representations as to the accuracy of its GIS data, and assumes no liability or responsibility for any errors or omissions in its GIS data. Independent verification of all inforamtion derived from the GIS data is strongly recommended. Under no circumstances will Buncombe County be held liable to any party who relies on information derived from its GIS data, and anyone relying on its GIS data does so at his/her own risk. The DATA REQUESTER AGREES TO INDEMNIFY BUNCOMBE COUNTY, INCLUDING COURT COSTS AND REASONABLE ATTORNEY FEES, FOR ANY CLAIMS FILED AGAINST THE COUNTY INVOLVING ANY ERRORS OR OMISSIONS IN THE COUNTY'S DATA AS IT RELATES TO THE DATA REQUESTOR'S PURPOSE.
The distribution of this GIS data by Buncombe County does not create any right or benefit, substantive or procedural, enforceable at law or equity, by officers, its employees, or any other person.

stdorder.ordering: Contact Buncombe County GIS by email at karen.brown@buncombecounty.org and specifiy what you are requesting. Any work beyond a simply copy of a data dump to CD is considered a special project and will be charged $200 per 15 minute increments.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
